text:
## Conversation Summary

### **What Was Done:**
- **üöö Added Vozovoz to the shipping calculator** with full API integration (vozovoz.ru)
- **‚úÖ Implemented automatic API health checks** that run on page load to show real connection status
- **üîß Fixed duplicate UI blocks** - removed top "Connected Companies" section, kept only the dynamic block under calculations
- **üìä Made API status dynamic** - "Connected/Error/Checking..." now reflects actual API responses
- **üì¶ Enhanced Vozovoz calculations** to include:
  - Pickup from address service
  - Delivery to address service  
  - Changed packaging from cardboard box to wooden crating (–æ–±—Ä–µ—à–µ—Ç–∫–∞)
- **üñ®Ô∏è Fixed PDF export** - auto-expands details, black text, proper print styles
- **‚öôÔ∏è Updated Vozovoz API URL** from vozovoz.org to vozovoz.ru

### **Files Modified:**
- **`app/page.tsx`** - Main calculator with dynamic company status, enhanced Vozovoz integration, removed duplicate blocks
- **`app/api/vozovoz/route.ts`** - Updated API URL to vozovoz.ru
- **`app/globals.css`** - Added comprehensive print media styles for PDF export

### **Current Status:**
**4 Active Shipping Companies:**
- –ü–≠–ö (üöõ)
- –î–µ–ª–æ–≤—ã–µ –õ–∏–Ω–∏–∏ (üì¶) 
- Rail Continent (üöÇ)
- –í–æ–∑–æ–≤–æ–∑ (üöö) - newly enhanced

### **What We're Currently Doing:**
Adding **Nord Wheel** as the 5th shipping company to complete the full roster.

### **Next Steps Needed:**
1. **Add Nord Wheel to COMPANIES_BASE array** with proper logo and API key
2. **Update API status checking** to include Nord Wheel endpoint
3. **Test the complete system** with all 5 companies showing dynamic status

### **Technical Context:**
- Using Next.js 14 App Router with TypeScript
- Dynamic API status monitoring with real-time health checks
- All companies show live connection status: "–ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–æ", "–æ—à–∏–±–∫–∞", or "–ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∫–∞..."
- Enhanced service breakdown for accurate cost calculations
- Proper PDF export functionality with print-optimized styling

The system now has comprehensive shipping cost calculation with real-time API monitoring and needs Nord Wheel addition to reach the target of 5 connected transport companies.

---

Now I'll add Nord Wheel to complete the 5-company roster:
